allHotels.Name: Ibis Bengaluru City Centre Hotel
allHotels.Description: Ibis Bengaluru City Centre Hotel is reported to allow dogs, but we havenâ€™t received information on their pet fee, weight limit, and other restrictions yet. Please call +1918042548000 for more information on their pet policy prior to booking or choose a different pet friendly hotel in Bengaluru for your trip.

allHotels.Name: VRBO Bengaluru
allHotels.Description: Pet policies are determined by the individual owner of each Vrbo property. For more information on the pet fee, weight limit and other restrictions at a dog-friendly Vrbo in Bengaluru, please contact the owner directly or read the 'House Rules' section of their listing. Also be sure to include your pet(s) in the 'Guest' field when making your reservation, so the pet fee can be included. If applicable, it will be usually be displayed in the 'On-site Fees' or 'Owner Fees' sections during checkout. Some owners will also wait until you arrive in Bengaluru to collect the pet fee.

allHotels.Name: Ibis Bengaluru Hosur Road Hotel
allHotels.Description: Ibis Bengaluru Hosur Road Hotel allows 1 pet under 35 kg for an additional fee of INR 1000 per night. Guests with pets are allowed in Standard Rooms only. Both dogs and cats are accepted. Pets cannot be left unattended.

allHotels.Name: Chris Hotel Whitefield
allHotels.Description: Chris Hotel Whitefield allows dogs of any size for an additional fee of INR 500 per pet, per night. Cats may also be allowed by request.

allHotels.Name: Springs Hotel and Spa
allHotels.Description: Springs Hotel and Spa allows one pet up to 40 kg for no additional fee. Both dogs and cats are welcome.

allHotels.Name: Laika Boutique Stay
allHotels.Description: Laika Boutique Stay is pet friendly! Dogs of any size are allowed for no additional fee.

allHotels.Name: ChukkiMane
allHotels.Description: Chukkimane allows pets of any size for no additional fee. They have interactive sessions for pets, like the exercise offered by a carefree morning run which will keep them fit, firing, and boost their energy levels as well. Take your pet on a refreshing tour of the countryside, passing by the farms, plantations, and the banks of the river Kaveri, cool off with your pet by taking a dip in our water pond, have your pet accompany you as you bike through the country landscape for a fun adventure, energize your pet with a light game of fetch inside our facility. Gagana & Barachukki huts are located right outside. With special resting spaces in every room, your pet can spend the night with the family during your stay at Chukkimane. We offer the best facility for both visitors and their pets.

allHotels.Name: Vivanta Bengaluru Whitefield
allHotels.Description: Vivanta Bengaluru Whitefield allows two pets up to 55 kg for a fee of INR 3000 per pet, per stay.

allHotels.Name: Cosmo Annora
allHotels.Description: Cosmo Annora allows dogs of any size for an additional fee. Cats may also be allowed by request.

allHotels.Name: Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road
allHotels.Description: Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road welcomes one pet up to 35 kg for an additional fee of INR 1500 per night. Both dogs and cats are allowed, but pets may not be left unattended in rooms.

allHotels.Name: Ibis Bengaluru Outer Ring Road
allHotels.Description: Ibis Bengaluru Outer Ring Road welcomes one pet up to 35 kg for an additional fee of INR 1000 per night. Both dogs and cats are allowed, but pets may not be left unattended in rooms.

allHotels.Description: Cross Roads Inn allows dogs of any size for an additional fee of INR 2000 per pet, per night. Cats may also be allowed by request.

allHotels.Name: Howard Johnson by Wyndham Bengaluru Hebbal
allHotels.Description: Howard Johnson by Wyndham Bengaluru Hebbal allows pets of any size for an additional fee of INR 1511 per pet, per night. Cats are not accepted.

allHotels.Name: Halcyon Hotel Residences
allHotels.Description: Halcyon Hotel Residences allows dogs of any size for an additional fee of INR 500 per pet, per night. Cats and birds are also welcome. Pets must be current on all vaccinations, are not permitted in the common areas, and cannot be left unattended.

allHotels.Name: Vivanta Bengaluru Residency Road
allHotels.Description: Vivanta Bengaluru Residency Road allows dogs of any size for an additional fee of INR 1000 per pet, per night. Cats may also be allowed by request. Food and water bowls are available.

allHotels.Name: Grand Mercure Bangalore
allHotels.Description: Grand Mercure Bangalore allows dogs of any size in designated rooms for an additional fee of INR 1000 per pet, per night. Cats are also welcome. Pets may not be left unattended in rooms.
